description: a(0) = 0, a(1) = 1; for n > 1, a(n) is the smallest positive number whose sum a(n) + a(n-1) is distinct from all previous sums, a(i) + a(i-1), i=1..n-1, whose product a(n) * a(n-1) is distinct from all previous products, a(i) * a(i-1), i=1..n-1, and whose difference |a(n) - a(n-1)| is distinct from all previous differences, |a(i) - a(i-1)|, i=1..n-1.
